short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Tag Assistant Companion extension works with Tag Assistant to help troubleshoot installation of gtag.js and Google Tag Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When the Chrome extension is present, it enables additional features for Tag Assistant including debugging iframes and debugging multiple windows from the same debug session.
